short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast Export Amazon Product Reviews To CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast Amazon Reviews Export is a free tool to export Amazon product reviews automatically.

üÜì This extension will always be Free ! If you like it just buy me a coffee üçª.

* Features:

Export Amazon product reviews as CSV format with fields (full):
Reviewer, Reviewer Profile, Rating, Review Location, Review Date, Review Title, Review Text, Verified Purchase (Yes/No), Number of Helpful, Review URL.

* How it works:

1. Install the extension.
2. Open the extension.
3. Enter Amazon ASIN (required), select Marketplace.
4. Select Criteria (optional) : Sort By, Filter By, Stars.
5. Select the Displayed Fields (optional) in CSV.
6. Click button to start exporting!

* Support for almost Amazon sites: USA, UK, Germany, Canada, France, Italy, Japan, Australia, India, Spain.

Notes:
* 28/11/2024: Please login to Amazon before using this tool.
